s: I contacted the makers of the Libby canned 100% pure pumpkin because their product is inedible in my opinion. I had used it for years with no problem, but lately the amount of sand, grit, who knows what else, is ridiculous. I didn't realize that this has been a known problem with this product and am surprised they haven't corrected it. The response from the company was to send me coupons to replace the canned pumpkin, but I will never use this brand ...
